Counter-Strike a.k.a CS 1.6 a.k.a CS a.k.a DOOR STUCK is a first-person shooter that came out in the 2000s, by that I mean that there are outdateeeeeeeeeeeeeed graphics, ridiculous wallbangs still fixed by Valve and etc. etc. But if you enjoy a game that will garanted give you fun and A HELL OF A RAGE FOR THAT SNIPER ON THE WAY TO BOMBSITE B THAT ALWAYS SHOOT FRICKIN' YOU WHEN YOU LEAST EXPECT IT, *huh* you'll enjoy it so much. And I hope that it brings you the same fun that it brought me.

P.S. I WILL FIND YOU AND I WILL KILL YOU, SNIPER ON THE WAY TO BOMBSITE B THAT ALWAYS SHOOT THAT ALWAYS SHOOTS ME.
Recomiendo mucho este juego por delante de otras versiones (Condition Zero y el Counter Striker Online)
